JobFullDesc: About the Role  By combining their technical strategy and industry expertise, Partner Engineers scalably empower merchant partners to adopt Uber’s products and services to derive maximum business value. As a Senior Partner Engineer, you will be responsible for: Defining and executing on merchant integration strategy at a mega-region level.Interfacing directly with all different types of partners to understand how they can derive optimal business value through integrations.Working closely with:Product & Software Engineering teams to influence product strategy and accelerate product adoption.Operation and scaled support teams to improve their process efficiency. Basic Qualifications Experience working as a Software Engineer or with an Engineering educational background.Experience working in a client/partner facing roles with senior executive counterparts.Experience proactively influencing product direction and strategy.Proven data-analytics skills (e.g. SQL). Preferred QualificationsExperience working with Merchant-style partners (Restaurant Brands; Point of Sales; Delivery Aggregators).Experience running or defining enterprise developer partner programs.
